item.title: [Error] (11:1): Semicolon (';') expected. help please
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

[scar]var
x,y:integer;

procedure start;
begin
repeat
sendarrowsilent(3);
sendarrowsilent(1);
until(getcolor(161,350)=255);
end;

begin
start;
end.[/scar]

ok i fixed it for you.
you needed a main loop in your script.
hope this helps
~jR

Read full topic

item.title: [Error] (11:1): Semicolon (';') expected. help please
item.dc:creator: @mellinox mellinox
item.description:
@mellinox wrote:

all i’m trying to do is make a very simple script to press the left arrow key then the right arrow key as fast as it can. this is what i have so far.

var
x,y:integer;

procedure start;
begin
repeat
sendarrowsilent(3);
sendarrowsilent(1);
until(getcolor(161,350)=255);
end.

i thought that that would work, i don’t see why it wouldn’t but it doesn’t.

please someone help, i use SCAR and don’t know how to download SRL right or how to use it, so try to keep it to only SCAR

Read full topic
